boardgame.description: Your quiet little 16th century village has suddenly become infested with some very unfriendly werewolves...can you and the other villagers find them before they devour everyone?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Ultimate Werewolf: Ultimate Edition is the ultimate party game for anywhere from 5 to 68 players of all ages. Each player has an agenda: as a villager, hunt down the werewolves; as a werewolf, convince the other villagers that you're innocent, while secretly dining on those same villagers each night. Dozens of special roles are available to help both the villagers and the werewolves achieve their goals while thwarting their opponents._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Contents More than 30 unique roles, 18 different scenarios to allow groups of all sizes and experience levels to quickly get up and running, a set of 80 fully illustrated cards, a moderator scorepad to keep track of games, and a comprehensive game guide with dozens of pages full of insights, tips and strategies. This set has everything you need for the best Ultimate Werewolf experience possible, whether you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;re playing with a small circle of friends at home, a huge gathering of gamers in Ohio or as an engaging team building exercise at the office._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Ultimate Werewolf: Ultimate Edition Roles:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Apprentice Seer, Aura Seer, Bodyguard, Cupid, Diseased, Ghost, Hunter, Idiot, Lycan, Magician, Martyr, Mason (3), Mayor, Old Hag, Old Man, P.I., Pacifist, Priest, Prince, Seer (2: 1 male _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; 1 female), Spellcaster, Tough Guy, Troublemaker, Villager (20), Witch, Sorcerer, Minion, Werewolf (12), Wolf Cub, Cursed, Doppelganger, Drunk, Cult Leader, Hoodlum, Tanner, Teenage Werewolf, Lone Wolf, Vampire (6), Amulet of Protection, Moderator, Blank Cards (3)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Re-implements:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Werewolf_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Ultimate Werewolf: Whitebox Edition_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Differences between 2010 Edition and 2008 Edition:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Role cards now have ability text_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Includes Ultimate Werewolf: Classic Movie Monsters_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; No Magician card_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Only eight Werewolf cards (note that rulebook still says twelve)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Only two blank cards (note that rulebook still says three)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Vampires are valued at -7 (previously -8)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Differences between 2011 Edition and 2010 Edition:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Includes Ultimate Werewolf: Night Terrors instead of Ultimate Werewolf: Classic Movie Monsters_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Differences between 2013 Edition and 2011 Edition:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Includes Ultimate Werewolf: Urban Legends instead of Ultimate Werewolf: Night Terrors_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: New in shrink. Buyer to prepay with PayPal and to pay $10.00 s/h priority mail in 48 states.

New/sealed item! Fast shipping! Pay via paypal to maydaygames@gmail.com or save 2% by paying to existingfunds@sphiatt.com instead with existing paypal funds. Buyer to pay just $3.95 shipping! Yes we can combine shipping on multiple items! Save even more! Please paypal payments to maydaygames@gmail.com or save 2% by sending payments to existingfunds@sphiatt.com instead. Be SURE you include what item you are buying with the payment.

*** 4th Dimension Games *** Ultimate Werewolf - Ultimate Edition: $20.95 In Stock (7% sales tax for residents of Pennsylvania) This is a New, Sealed in Box Ultimate Werewolf - Ultimate Edition board game. Publisher: Bezier Games Number of Players: 5-68 Ages: 10+ Length: 30 Minutes Shipping: Shipping rates will be determined upon sale or request. Insurance is optional but highly recommended for higher priced items. Payment: I accept PayPal, money orders and cashier_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s checks. Personal checks will be accepted but I will wait until the check has cleared before sending the item. Return Policy: I want you to be completely satisfied with your item. Because of this, I will accept return of any item for a refund of the purchase price within 30 days of the sale. The item must be in the same condition that it was sent. I cannot refund the shipping cost.
Uk 1st class £2.20 Europe £3.80

CLS Games - Atlanta_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Boardgame Warehouse - is the largest retailer of board games in metro Atlanta! All games are new _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; still in factory shrink-wrap. ULTIMATE WEREWOLF ULTIAMTE EDITION: $18.95 Bezier Games [BEZ UWUE] SHIPPING Continental U.S. - FedEx: $12.95 International (Including AK _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; HI) - USPS Priority Mail: TBD
Uk 1st class £2.20 Europe £3.80
The cards, rulebook and scoring pad are in like-new condition. The box is slightly damaged (I originally bought the game as slightly damaged).
Auction winner - grinspy

KK Boardgames ~ supplier-direct games ~ your Canadian and US source for discount game prices based in Vancouver, BC and Blaine, WA. All prices in USD and all games are new and in shrink unless otherwise stated. For Canadian customers who want to pay in CAD, we can convert to CAD based on the current exchange rate. ULTIMATE WEREWOLF: $18.74 Availability: DIRECT ORDER - In stock at supplier. *** Usually ships in 1-2 weeks ***. We will include the game in our next order from our supplier* *Next order date - to see our next order date click onthe _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;More info..._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; link. If the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;More info..._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; link is not visible, click on the user ID _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;kkrieger_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; to view our _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;geekstore_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;, then click on the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;More info..._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; link for a specific game. SHIPPING: We are near the US/Canada border so we can ship from either country. We charge actual shipping cost and there are absolutely no customs fees for US and Canada orders! Multiple games can be combined in a single shipment to save you money. Shipping methods: US Orders: USPS from zipcode 98230. Canadian Orders: Canada Post from postal code V3S 1C7. International Orders: USPS Priority Mail International with insurance and return receipt. PAYMENT METHODS: 1) Paypal Instant Transfer - 2.9% + $0.30 processing fee applies (funded by existing funds or bank account) 2) Interac Money Transfer (Canadian bank account holders only) 3) Credit Card - 2.9% + $0.30 processing fee applies (processed by PayPal) 4) COD for local pickups in greater Vancouver (BC) area. A pre-paid deposit is required for local pick-ups. Deposit is credited to your bill when you pick up your games. 5) Money Order - We will accept postal money orders but will not ship until we have received and cashed the money order. We will provide detailed payment instructions for you once the order is placed. CONTACT US: Although we will make an effort to respond to all questions via geekmail as quickly as possible, your response time will be faster if you send questions via email to kkboardgames+bgg@gmail.com

Bezier Games (BEZ UWUE) Your quiet little 16th century village has suddenly become infested with some very unfriendly werewolves...can you and the other villagers find them before they devour everyone? Ultimate Werewolf: Ultimate Edition is the ultimate party game for anywhere from 5 to 68 players of all ages. Each player has an agenda: as a villager, hunt down the werewolves; as a werewolf, convince the other villagers that you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re innocent, while secretly dining on those same villagers each night. Dozens of special roles are available to help both the villagers and the werewolves achieve their goals while thwarting their opponents. Contents More than 40 unique roles, 18 different scenarios to allow groups of all sizes and experience levels to quickly get up and running, a set of 80 fully illustrated cards, a moderator scorepad to keep track of games, and a comprehensive game guide with dozens of pages full of insights, tips and strategies. This set has everything you need for the best Ultimate Werewolf experience possible, whether you’re playing with a small circle of friends at home, a huge gathering of gamers in Ohio or as an engaging team building exercise at the office.

Bezier Games (BEZUWU3) Your quiet little 16th century village has suddenly become infested with some very unfriendly werewolves...can you and the other villagers find them before they devour everyone? Ultimate Werewolf: Ultimate Edition is the ultimate party game for anywhere from 5 to 68 players of all ages. Each player has an agenda: as a villager, hunt down the werewolves; as a werewolf, convince the other villagers that you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re innocent, while secretly dining on those same villagers each night. Dozens of special roles are available to help both the villagers and the werewolves achieve their goals while thwarting their opponents. The Third Edition contains a new bonus scenario.

Ultimate Werewolf: Ultimate Edition is the ultimate party game for anywhere from 5 to 68 players of all ages. Each player has an agenda: as a villager, hunt down the werewolves; as a werewolf, convince the other villagers that you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re innocent, while secretly dining on those same villagers each night. Dozens of special roles are available to help both the villagers and the werewolves achieve their goals while thwarting their opponents.
